review: One of the best movies I have ever seen in my entire life. The following film has made a large impact on the way I think and do things...this movie has successfully killed a majority of my brain cells. I recommend everyone to watch this master piece...you will want to kill yourself at first but believe me that slowly your pain will start numbing due to your brain slowly melting in your head. In conclusion good fun...
